title: M4: Group discussion on pre-editing success
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 30 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: providing examples of source texts with different functions translated by different MT engines might be helpful. Instructors can specify a translation situation/context in order to give an idea of the quality assessment linked to this particular translation.
